item.title: 08. SPOTIFY VIDEO Fillers and Discourse Markers with Valerie (transcribed)
item.description: Do you use filler words and discourse markers? Do you teach and learn them in your classroom? This is Gav & Em's discussion topic today. Featuring a very special guest, Valerie Fridland, a sociolinguist studying the interactions between language and society and the author of the hilarious and educational book Like, Literally, Dude: Arguing for the Good in Bad English (Viking). In today's show, Valerie explains the uses of one of the most common filler words, like... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/13a8ec84/podcast/rss

item.title: The Princess Bride | Discussion
item.description: April and Kenny discuss the 1987 film The Princess Bride, directed by Rob Reiner, starring Cary Elwes, Robin Wright, Mandy Patinkin, Chris Sarandon, Wallace Shawn, André the Giant, and Christopher Guest. Feed: https://geekspective.com/feed/podcast/
